english_example_sentence: You always carefully consider the difficult paths of life.
russian_example_sentence: Ты всегда внимательно обдумываешь трудные пути жизни.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen her zaman hayatın zorlu yollarını dikkatle düşünürsün.
